GameEnvironment - Class in monsterfighter.core
Manages the Monster Fighter application.
GameEnvironment(GameEnvironmentUi, List<Monster>, List<Item>) - Constructor for class monsterfighter.core.GameEnvironment
Constructs the GameEnvironment that will interact with the user interface and call the core classes.
GameEnvironment.Difficulty - Enum Class in monsterfighter.core
Represents the difficulty of a game.
GameEnvironmentUi - Interface in monsterfighter.ui
Defines a user interface (UI) for a GameEnvironment.
